author: Zemtzov7
long_description:
# Usage
* `/doas <playername> <command> [params]`

* This command requires `doas` privilege, which granged automatically to singleplayer or host account

* Warning! `doas` is bypassing privileges(except grant,revoke commands), e.g. `/doas UnprivilegedSam giveme adminpick` will work(if player online).
name: doas
short_description: Execute commands on behalf of another player
title: DoAs
